duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and explain repair process, insurance claims, and payment procedures to customers
Provide regular repair status updates to customers through calls or text messages
Communicate with Service Advisor to get updates on vehicle repair status
Perform final quality control check before customer pickup to ensure repair quality meets standards
Conduct administrative tasks including payment collection, rental matching, and AR follow-up calls
Provide additional support to Service Advisor as needed

education_certification.credential: Legally authorized to work in the United States
6 months or more of prior experience in a fast-paced, customer service environment
Proficiency with Computers and other software
